verses.name: Genesis 4:24
verses.text: If Cain shall be avenged sevenfold, truly Lamech seventy and sevenfold.

verses.name: Genesis 4:25
verses.text: And Adam knew his wife again; and she bare a son, and called his name Seth: For God, said she, hath appointed me another seed instead of Abel, whom Cain slew.

verses.name: Genesis 4:26
verses.text: And to Seth, to him also there was born a son; and he called his name Enos: then began men to call upon the name of the Lord.
